name: Shift Cycle Daily Planner
description: A daily planner designed for a 2-day, 2-night, 4-off rotating shift schedule. It allows users to add daily notes and export monthly summaries as CSV files.
prompt: Add work location settings and overtime tracking based on geolocation. When a user is at their saved work location on an 'Off' day, prompt them to mark it as overtime, which stars the day and adds a note.
